Package com.example.GuitarSite.controller

Class GuitarController

java.lang.Object
com.example.GuitarSite.controller.GuitarController
@RestController public class GuitarController extends Object
this is the GuitarController class that makes the connection with the interface and here we can see he http requests mapped also here we can see the endpoints for each methode that was implemented in the GuitarServImp

  • Method Details

    • addGuitar

      @PostMapping("/addGuitar") public Guitar addGuitar(@RequestBody Guitar guitar)
      Controller handling guitar-related HTTP requests. Adds a new guitar via HTTP POST request.

    • addGuitars

      @PostMapping("/addGuitars") public List<Guitar> addGuitars(@RequestBody List<Guitar> guitars)
      Controller handling bulk guitar addition via HTTP POST request.

    • findGuitars

      @GetMapping("/showGuitars") public List<Guitar> findGuitars()
      Retrieves all guitars via HTTP GET request.

    • findGuitarById

      @GetMapping("/guitarById/{id}") public Guitar findGuitarById(@PathVariable int id)
      Retrieves a guitar by ID via HTTP GET request.

    • findGuitaryName

      @GetMapping("/guitarByType/{type}") public Guitar findGuitaryName(@PathVariable String type)
      Retrieves a guitar by type via HTTP GET request.

    • updateGuitar

      @PutMapping("/guitarUpdate") public Guitar updateGuitar(@RequestBody Guitar guitar)
      Updates a guitar via HTTP PUT request.

    • deleteGuitar

      @DeleteMapping("/guitarDelete/{id}") public String deleteGuitar(@PathVariable int id)
      Deletes a guitar by ID via HTTP DELETE request.
